name: Hui Lin
bio: Experienced SQA professional with expertise in designing and executing test plans, creating and maintaining automated test suites, and performing exploratory testing to identify potential issues. Skilled in a variety of testing frameworks and tools, with a proven track record of collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure high-quality software products. Passionate about continuously improving the quality assurance process and delivering exceptional software products.

experience.title: Software Engineer In Test
description: Develop and maintain test automation scripts using Python and shell scripts
Perform functional, integration, and regression testing on Dell's VxRail product suites
Conduct regression testing an prvoide input on software releases
Participate in code reviews and provide feedback to development teams

experience.title: Software QA Engineer
description: Design and execute manual and automated tests for Claris FileMaker products (Server, Pro, WebDirect)
Create test plans and test cases based on software requirements and specifications
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and resolve software defects
Track and report defects using Jira and Confluence
Conduct performance, scalability and stability tests using open source tools such as jMeter and K6 with integration of Jenkins to achieve continous testing, and driving quality upstream

Set up Prometheous and Grafana to continously monitor applicaiton's health (memory leaks, process crashes, hangs) while performing load and stress test, so developers can provide fixes early in the SDLC

experience.title: Information Technology Staff
description: Maintained and implemented new features to company website
Set up and mainted company's hardware and software
